SELECT workOrder.id AS "id", workOrder.type AS "type", workOrder.declaration_time AS "declarationTime", workOrder.emergency_level AS "emergencyLevel", client.NAME AS "clientName", client.province AS "province", client.city AS "city", client.area AS "area", client.community AS "community", client.address AS "address", client.longitude AS "longitude", client.latitude AS "latitude", detail.id AS "detailId" FROM ic_work_order_detail detail LEFT JOIN ic_work_order workOrder ON workOrder.id = detail.work_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_client client ON client.id = workOrder.client_id WHERE workOrder.status = '1'
AND workOrder.type = #{type}

SELECT client.`name` AS "clientName", contact.`name` AS "contactName", contact.mobile_phone AS "contactPhone", client.province AS "province", client.city AS "city", client.area AS "area", client.community AS "community", client.address AS "address", workOrder.`status` AS "status", workOrder.type AS "type", detail.assigned_time AS "assignedTime", workOrder.id AS "id", workOrder.number AS "number" FROM ic_work_order_detail detail LEFT JOIN ic_work_order workOrder ON workOrder.id = detail.work_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_client client ON client.id = workOrder.client_id LEFT JOIN tb_contact contact ON contact.client_id = client.id
